feed.title: Releases | Buddies of Budgie
feed.subtitle: Buddies of Budgie posts in the category Releases

entry.title: Budgie 10.9.1 Released
entry.summary: Budgie 10.9.1 is the first minor release of Budgie 10.9 series of our Budgie Desktop environment. This release squashes some bugs in the TabSwitcher and Workspace applet.

entry.title: Budgie 10.9 Released
entry.summary: Budgie 10.9 is a brand new release series for Budgie Desktop, introducing a redesigned Bluetooth applet, early porting efforts towards supporting Wayland, and adopting budgie-session for session management.

entry.title: Budgie 10.8.2 Released
entry.summary: Budgie 10.8.2 is the second minor release in the 10.8 series of our Budgie Desktop environment. This release features some bug fixes around the system tray, notifications, and a small improvement to Budgie Screenshot.

entry.title: Budgie 10.8.1 Released
entry.summary: Budgie 10.8.1 is the first minor release in the 10.8 series of our Budgie Desktop environment. This release adds dark style preference support, squashes some bugs around our new StatusNotifierItem implementation, adds keyword support for search, and more!

entry.title: Budgie 10.8 Released
entry.summary: Budgie 10.8 is a brand new release series for Budgie Desktop, featuring improvements to Budgie Menu, adoption of StatusNotifier support in System Tray, Magpie v0.x support, and more!

entry.title: Budgie 10.7.2 Released
entry.summary: Budgie 10.7.2 is the second minor release in the 10.7 series of our Budgie Desktop environment, primarily focused on bug fixes, additional compatibility with GNOME 44 stack, and various quality-of-life improvements.

entry.title: Budgie 10.7.1 Released
entry.summary: Budgie 10.7.1 is the first minor release in the 10.7 series of our Budgie Desktop environment, introducing some improvements, bug fixes, and updated translations.

entry.title: Budgie 10.7 Released
entry.summary: Budgie 10.7 is a brand new release series for Budgie Desktop, featuring major re-architectures, new APIs for extensibility, and polish to the user experience.

entry.title: Budgie 10.6.4 Released
entry.summary: Budgie 10.6.4 is the fourth minor release in the 10.6 series of our Budgie Desktop environment. This release contains bug fixes and build system improvements.

entry.title: Budgie 10.6.3 Released
entry.summary: Budgie 10.6.3 is the third minor release in the 10.6 series of our Budgie Desktop environment, introducing improvements to our Workspace Applet and initial support for GNOME 43!

entry.title: Budgie 10.6.2 Released
entry.summary: Budgie 10.6.2 is the second minor release in the 10.6 series of our Budgie Desktop environment, introducing fixes for bugs and improving code quality!

entry.title: Budgie 10.6.1 Released
entry.summary: Budgie 10.6.1 is the first minor release that introduces fixes for bugs in the 10.6 series of our Budgie Desktop environment.

entry.title: Budgie 10.6 Released
entry.summary: Budgie 10.6 is the first release of Budgie under the new Buddies Of Budgie organization! ðŸš€ðŸš€ðŸš€

entry.title: Budgie 10.5.3 Released
entry.summary: Budgie 10.5.3 is a minor release that introduces fixes for bugs, various quality-of-life improvements, and support for the GNOME 40 stack.

entry.title: Budgie 10.5.2 Released
entry.summary: Budgie 10.5.2 introduces new goodies to make your Budgie experience even better!

entry.title: Budgie Desktop View: First Development Release!
entry.summary: Today we are thrilled to announce the first generally public development release of Budgie Desktop View!

entry.title: Budgie 10.5.1 Released
entry.summary: Budgie 10.5.1 is the first minor release of the Budgie 10.5 series, introducing a multitude of quality-of-life changes, bug fixes, and support for new GNOME Stacks.

entry.title: Budgie 10.5 Released
entry.summary: Budgie 10.5 is the first release in our series 5 updates for Budgie 10!

entry.title: Budgie 10.4 Released
entry.summary: Budgie 10.4 is the first release in our series 4 updates for Budgie 10!

entry.title: Budgie 10.3 Released
entry.summary: Budgie 10.3 is the first release in our series 3 updates for Budgie 10!
